thread.title: Facebook Privacy Case Can Be Tried in Austria
thread.title_full: Facebook Privacy Case Can Be Tried in Austria - WSJ

author: Friedrich Geiger
title: Facebook Privacy Case Can Be Tried in Austria
text:
BERLIN—An Austrian appeals court has decided that a privacy complaint by a Viennese activist against Facebook Inc. can be tried in Austria, overturning a regional court’s rejection of the case and adding to the headwinds the social network is already facing in Europe.
Maximilian Schrems lodged a complaint in 2013 against Facebook over alleged privacy violations, claiming the company’s data-use policy was invalid under European Union law.
